DataElement.preferredDefinition: The name of the contact person associated with the shipping source of a specimen.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Tracking Shipping Source Contact Person
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._The act or process of following a person, animal, or object through space or time._The act or business of transporting goods._Where something is available or from where it originates._A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group.
